properties.name: security.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used in encrypting jwt token.

properties.name: security.jwt.expirationMs
properties.description: Jwt token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: api.error.include-debug-message
properties.description: Decideds whether the error message should contain the exception debug details.

properties.name: securtiy.jwt.prefix
properties.description: Jwt token prefix in the header carrying it.
